[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@here/harp-mapview](./harp-mapview.md) &gt; [PoiInfo](./harp-mapview.poiinfo.md)

## PoiInfo interface

Additional information for an icon that is to be rendered along with a \[\[TextElement\]\].

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface PoiInfo 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [computedHeight](./harp-mapview.poiinfo.computedheight.md) | number |  Should be computed during loading/initializing of <code>ImageTexture</code>. |
|  [computedWidth](./harp-mapview.poiinfo.computedwidth.md) | number |  Should be computed during loading/initializing of <code>ImageTexture</code>. |
|  [featureId](./harp-mapview.poiinfo.featureid.md) | number | ID to identify the (POI) icon. |
|  [iconBrightness](./harp-mapview.poiinfo.iconbrightness.md) | number | Icon brightness. \[\[MarkerTechniqueParams.iconBrightness\]\]; |
|  [iconColor](./harp-mapview.poiinfo.iconcolor.md) | THREE.Color | Icon color override \[\[MarkerTechniqueParams.iconColor\]\]; |
|  [iconIsOptional](./harp-mapview.poiinfo.iconisoptional.md) | boolean | If true, the text will appear even if the icon cannot be rendered because of missing icon graphics. Defaults to <code>true</code>. |
|  [iconMaxZoomLevel](./harp-mapview.poiinfo.iconmaxzoomlevel.md) | number | Maximum zoomLevel at which to display the label icon. No default. |
|  [iconMinZoomLevel](./harp-mapview.poiinfo.iconminzoomlevel.md) | number | Minimum zoomLevel at which to display the label icon. No default. |
|  [imageItem](./harp-mapview.poiinfo.imageitem.md) | [ImageItem](./harp-mapview.imageitem.md) |  Direct access to \[\[ImageItem\]\] once it is resolved. |
|  [imageTexture](./harp-mapview.poiinfo.imagetexture.md) | [ImageTexture](./harp-datasource-protocol.imagetexture.md) |  Direct access to \[\[ImageTexture\]\] once it is resolved. |
|  [imageTextureName](./harp-mapview.poiinfo.imagetexturename.md) | string | Name of the \[\[ImageTexture\]\]. |
|  [isValid](./harp-mapview.poiinfo.isvalid.md) | boolean | If isValid is <code>false</code>, the icon will no longer be placed or rendered. The reason may be a missing resource. |
|  [mayOverlap](./harp-mapview.poiinfo.mayoverlap.md) | boolean | If <code>true</code>, icon is allowed to overlap other labels or icons of lower priority. |
|  [poiName](./harp-mapview.poiinfo.poiname.md) | string | Name of the POI description in the \[\[PoiTable\]\]. |
|  [poiRenderBatch](./harp-mapview.poiinfo.poirenderbatch.md) | number |  Internal reference to a render batch, made up of all icons that use the same Material. |
|  [poiTableName](./harp-mapview.poiinfo.poitablename.md) | string | Name of the POI table \[\[PoiTable\]\]. |
|  [renderOrder](./harp-mapview.poiinfo.renderorder.md) | number |  Computed from owning \[\[TextElement\]\]. Value is set when <code>PoiInfo</code> is assigned to \[\[TextElement\]\]. |
|  [renderTextDuringMovements](./harp-mapview.poiinfo.rendertextduringmovements.md) | boolean |  If false, text will not be rendered during camera movements. Defaults to <code>true</code>; |
|  [reserveSpace](./harp-mapview.poiinfo.reservespace.md) | boolean | If <code>true</code>, icon will reserve screen space, other markers of lower priority will not be able to overlap. |
|  [shieldGroupIndex](./harp-mapview.poiinfo.shieldgroupindex.md) | number |  Layout help: A shield group is for all \[\[LineMarker\]\]s that have the same icon and text, making them the same road shield icon. |
|  [stackMode](./harp-mapview.poiinfo.stackmode.md) | [PoiStackMode](./harp-datasource-protocol.poistackmode.md) | Specify stack mode. Defaults to <code>ShowInStack</code>. |
|  [technique](./harp-mapview.poiinfo.technique.md) | [PoiTechnique](./harp-datasource-protocol.poitechnique.md) \| [LineMarkerTechnique](./harp-datasource-protocol.linemarkertechnique.md) | Technique defining the POI or LineMarker |
|  [textElement](./harp-mapview.poiinfo.textelement.md) | [TextElement](./harp-mapview.textelement.md) | Reference back to owning \[\[TextElement\]\]. |
|  [textIsOptional](./harp-mapview.poiinfo.textisoptional.md) | boolean | If true, the text icon will appear even if the text part is blocked by other labels. Defaults to <code>false</code>. |
|  [textMaxZoomLevel](./harp-mapview.poiinfo.textmaxzoomlevel.md) | number | Maximum zoomLevel at which to display the label text. No default. |
|  [textMinZoomLevel](./harp-mapview.poiinfo.textminzoomlevel.md) | number | Minimum zoomLevel at which to display the label text. No default. |
|  [uvBox](./harp-mapview.poiinfo.uvbox.md) | [Math2D.UvBox](./harp-utils.math2d.uvbox.md) |  Should be computed during loading/initializing of <code>ImageTexture</code>. |
